welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Codorus, where the charm of a small town meets the beauty of nature. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Harrisburg International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Capital City Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, no password required.
